dict.acceptation: 欠…债；感激；应归功于；怀有情感；

sent.orig: Accounts payable-a liability we owe them money, we bought merchandise on account and owe them.
sent.trans: 应付账款是负债，表示我们欠别人的钱。我们用赊购的方式买商品，那么我们就欠别人的钱。

sent.orig: Our sailors owe allegiance to the Queen; yours owe allegiance to the President.
sent.trans: 我们的水手效忠于女王，你们的效忠于总统。

sent.orig: We owe our teachers that, and we owe our children that.
sent.trans: 我们对教师有这样的义务，对我们的学生有这样的义务。

sent.orig: You owe me 100 bucks, and now you have the impudence to ask for more!
sent.trans: 你欠我一百块没还，居然还有脸要多借！

sent.orig: The next day Hurstwood said: "We owe the grocer five dollars and forty cents this week."
sent.trans: 第二天赫斯渥说：“这星期我们欠了食品店老板５块４毛钱。”
